edu.ucla.sspace.text.corpora

Class ChildesCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.text.DirectoryCorpusReader<Document>
      • edu.ucla.sspace.text.corpora.ChildesCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CorpusReader<Document>

    public class ChildesCorpusReader
extends DirectoryCorpusReader<Document>
    A corpus reader for the Childes corpus. Individual files will be traversed using an xml parser. Documents can be returned either as all of the utterances in a file or a single utterance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChildesCorpusReader()
      Constructs a new ChildesCorpusReader that uses no preprocessing before documents are returned.
      ChildesCorpusReader(DocumentPreprocessor preprocessor)
      Constructs a new ChildesCorpusReader that uses preprocessor to clean documents before they are returned.

      • corpusIterator

        protected Iterator<Document> corpusIterator(Iterator<File> files)
